src:
VIDEO: Luka Dončić v bolečinah, tekla je kri
Dončićevo moštvo Dallas Mavericks je izgubilo proti ekipi Los Angeles Lakers po podaljšku s 110 : 119.
02 Nov 2019, 06:50 by A. L.
DALLAS – Moštvo Dallas Mavericks, za katero igra tudi slovenski as Luka Dončić, je doživelo poraz proti ekipi Los Angeles Lakers. Po podaljšku je bil izid 110 : 119.Slovenskemu košarkarju je uspel nov trojni dvojček. Gre za že desetega, kar ga pri 20 letih postavlja med najboljše. Tokrat je dosegel 31 točk, 13 asistenc in 15 skokov, nasprotnik LeBron James pa 39 točk, 12 asistenc in 16 skokov. Dončić je prvi mladi igralec, ki je proti Lakersom dosegel trojni dvojček, pridružil pa se je tudi NBA-zvezdnikom, ki so še pred 21. letom dosegli več trojnih dvojčkov.Poleg poraza je Dončić na tekmi staknil še poškodbo. Po srditem boju je menda končal s tremi šivi na zadnji strani glave. Tuji mediji poročajo, da naj bi poškodba nastala, ko je z zadnjim delom glave zadel brado Dwighta Howarda. Kmalu zatem so namreč ugledali kri.
text:
VIDEO: Luka Doncic in pain, blood was flowing
Doncic's Dallas Mavericks lost to the Los Angeles Lakers after an extra time of 110: 119.
02 Nov 2019, 06:50 by A.L.
DALLAS - The Dallas Mavericks, also played by Slovenian ace Luka Doncic, have been defeated by the Los Angeles Lakers. After the extra time the result was 110: 119. The Slovenian basketball player succeeded in a new triple twin. This is the tenth one, which puts him among the best at 20. This time, he scored 31 points, 13 assists and 15 rebounds, while opponent LeBron James scored 39 points, 12 assists and 16 rebounds. Doncic is the first young player to reach the Triple Twins against the Lakers, and has joined the NBA stars who reached the Triple Twins even before the age of 21.Donk defeated Doncic in the match. After an angry fight, he allegedly ended up with three stitches at the back of his head. Foreign media reports say the injury was caused when he hit Dwight Howard's chin with the back of his head. Soon after, they saw blood.
